name: Air Canada 787-8 Dreamliner [C-GHPV] GORGEOUS Sunset Landing at Tokyo Narita!
description:
Probably the best lighting I've ever seen on arrival! Here is the approach and landing of AC003 from Vancouver into Tokyo-Narita International Airport. Watch as the pilots fight some wind on the approach, nail the landing, taxi past some interesting aircraft, all with some beautiful light :) The flight was great, and the lower cabin altitude really does make a difference. Again, like the takeoff video, I highly recommend that this be viewed with a good quality headset, and the video log can be seen below. Enjoy the video!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Air Canada (ACA/AC)
Aircraft: Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner (B788)
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: Standard
Engines: 2x GEnx-1B
Seat: 32K
Flying Time: 8 hours and 54 minutes
Arrival Time: 1640L
Registration: C-GHPV 
Route: YVR-NRT
Callsign: Air Canada 003 Heavy
Runway used: 16R
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/CGHPV
____________________________________________________

VIDEO LOG (Click on any of the times to skip ahead to that point in the video):
00:13 - Somewhere over the Pacific
00:23 - Still over the Pacific, speedbrakes extended
00:56 - Spoilers retracting, descent continues
01:14 - Descent announcements begin
01:41 - The coastline of Japan comes into view at last
04:22 - Some minor course corrections
05:16 - Another course correction
05:40 - Already some great lighting is seen
06:15 - Trailing edge flaps begin extending, turning
06:45 - Continuing to turn, the wing blocks the sun, creating a nice silhouette.
06:59 - Final approach announcements begin
07:35 - Making another turn.
08:30 - Flaps extend further, fully lined up with runway 16R
08:35 - Rivers appear with the sunlight reflecting off the water
10:30 - Some wind pushes our Dreamliner around a bit
11:30 - Final approach
12:01 - Crossing the threshold of RW16R
12:09 - We float a bit as our pilots put C-GHPV down nice and smooth.
12:12 - Touchdown, speedbrakes up
12:17 - Reversers engaged
12:55 - Exiting the runway on taxiway A8, speedbrakes retracted
13:40 - Flaps retracting 
14:12 - Turning towards the terminal as a United 777 roars past on departure
14:30 - Zooming in on a line of aircraft parked, including an Etihad A340-500 and a Qantas 747-400.
15:00 - Terminal One comes into view with a number of different aircraft parked, including a Thai A380 and several ANA aircraft.
15:40 - Turning into the gate, with a Cathay 777 visible in the background.
16:55 - Aircraft comes to a stop
17:01 - Shutdown
